name: Jira Trigger
semantic_context: Starts the workflow when Jira events occur
natural_language_description: 这是 Jira Trigger 节点。主要用于: Starts the workflow when Jira events occur

jiraVersion.name: jiraVersion
jiraVersion.natural_language_description: 参数名: Jira Version | 默认值: cloud

authenticateWebhook.name: authenticateWebhook
authenticateWebhook.description: Whether authentication should be activated for the incoming webhooks (makes it more secure)
authenticateWebhook.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authenticate Incoming Webhook | 作用: Whether authentication should be activated for the incoming webhooks (makes it more secure) | 默认值: False

incomingAuthentication.name: incomingAuthentication
incomingAuthentication.description: If authentication should be activated for the webhook (makes it more secure)
incomingAuthentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authenticate Webhook With | 作用: If authentication should be activated for the webhook (makes it more secure) | 默认值: none

events.name: events
events.natural_language_description: 参数名: Events | 作用: The events to listen to | 默认值: [] | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: excludeBody (值: None) - Whether a request with empty body will be sent to the URL. Leave unchecked if you want to receive JSON.
filter (值: None) - You can specify a JQL query to send only events triggered by matching issues. The JQL filter only applies to events under the Issue and Comment columns.
